Source code for hamcalc.math.metrics

"""hamcalc.math.metics

Yet More Unit Conversions.

Weight:

    ounce, pound, short ton, long ton

    gram, kilogram, metric ton

    >>> from hamcalc.math.metrics import Ounce, Pound, Long_Ton, Short_Ton
    >>> from hamcalc.math.metrics import Gram, Kilogram, Tonne
    >>> wt= Pound.to_std( 113 )
    >>> for u in Ounce, Pound, Long_Ton, Short_Ton:
    ...    print( round(u.from_std(wt),3) )
    1100
    113
    .041
    .052
    >>> for u in Gram, Kilogram, Tonne:
    ...    print( round(u.from_std(wt),3) )
    5000
    500
    .023

Volume:

    fluid ounce (imperial), fluid ounce (US),
    pint (imperial), pint (US),
    quart (imperial), quart (US),
    gallon (imperial), gallon (US),
    cu. in., cu. ft., cu. yd

    millilitre, litre, cu. cm, cu. metre

Length or Distance:

    inch, foot, yard, mile

    mm, cm, metre, kilometre

Area:

    sq.in., sq.ft., sq.yd., acre

    sq.cm., sq.metre, hectare

Pressure:

    PSI, lb/sq.in., lb/sq.ft., in.Hg

    kPa, mPa, bar, Kg/sq.metre

Energy:

    ft/lb

    BTU

Power:

    Horsepower

    Kilowatt

Force:

    lb.(force)

    newton

Torque or Moment:

    lb/in, lb/ft

    newton-metres

Temperature:

    fahrenheit

    celsius

"""
from hamcalc.lib import Unit, Standard_Unit
from hamcalc.math.baromtr import PSI, PSF, IN_Hg, KPA, MPA, BAR, KG_SQ_M
import hamcalc.math.equiv


[docs]class Kilogram( Standard_Unit ):
    """Kilogram"""
    name= "kg"



[docs]class Gram( Unit ):
    """Gram"""
    standard= Kilogram
    name= "g"
    factor= 1000



[docs]class Tonne( Unit ):
    """Metric Tonne"""
    standard= Kilogram
    name= "t"
    factor= .001



[docs]class Ounce( Unit ):
    """Ounce"""
    standard= Kilogram
    name= "oz."
    factor= 35.273962



[docs]class Pound( Unit ):
    """Pound"""
    standard= Kilogram
    name= "lb."
    factor= 2.2046226



[docs]class Short_Ton( Unit ):
    """Short Ton"""
    standard= Kilogram
    name= "t (US)"
    factor= 0.0011023113



[docs]class Long_Ton( Unit ):
    """Long Ton"""
    standard= Kilogram
    name= "t (UK)"
    factor= 0.00098420652
